properties.name: powerimo.rabbitmq.url
properties.description: URL of RabbitMQ instance. Default: empty.

properties.name: powerimo.rabbitmq.enabled
properties.description: Flag for enabling\disabling MQ interaction. Default: true.

properties.name: powerimo.rabbitmq.queue
properties.description: The name of Queue in MQ instance to connect. No default value.

properties.name: powerimo.rabbitmq.exchange-task
properties.description: RabbitMQ Tasks exchange name. Default value: tasks.

properties.name: powerimo.rabbitmq.exchange-events
properties.description: RabbitMQ Events exchange name. Default value: events.

properties.name: powerimo.appid
properties.description: Application ID used as SenderID in published messages.
